briefTitle: Pharmacist's Influence on Breast Cancer Patient Quality of Life
officialTitle: Influence of a Clinical Pharmacist's Intervention on Quality of Life of a Breast Cancer Patient Under Adjuvant Chemotherapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: changes in quality of life of a breast cancer patient under chemotherapy, after a clinical pharmacist's behavioral intervention, measured by EORTC B23 questionnaire
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early breast cancer
* First adjuvant chemotherapy
* Chemotherapy protocol: anthracycline x 4

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cardiovascular comorbidities
* Regular nausea or vomiting during six months before enrollment
* Unable to answer the quality of life questionnaire on their own
